DIY and professional mechanics trust Schumacher Electric’s extensive line of battery chargers and maintainers to keep their automotive, power sports, motorcycle, and marine batteries in top condition. The Schumacher SC1280 15A 6V/12V Fully Automatic Battery Charger and Maintainer is specifically designed to keep your 6V and 12V batteries fully charged and in optimum health. With a 15A rapid charge and a 3A charge/maintain mode, the SC1280 charges batteries quickly and then maintains a full charge while connected. Choose the 15A rate for charging automotive, marine, and light truck batteries. For smaller batteries, such as those used in garden tractors, snowmobiles, and motorcycles, select the 3A rate. Microprocessor controlled, the Schumacher SC1280 automatically adjusts the amperage rate during charging and maintaining as necessary. The unit also features auto voltage detection, float mode monitoring to maintain optimal battery charge, and multi-stage charging. Additional features include reverse hook-up protection, bad battery detection, a digital display, LED indicators, push-button controls, and color-coded clamps.
FULLY AUTOMATIC: The Schumacher SC1280 automatically detects 6V and 12V batteries. When the battery is fully charged, the unit automatically stops charging and shifts to maintain mode.
MICROPROCESSOR CONTROLLED: After gathering information from the connected battery, the microprocessor adjusts voltage and charge, allowing fast charging without negatively impacting battery capacity and longevity.
BOOST BATTERY HEALTH: The unit features multi-stage charging and float-mode monitoring for optimum battery health and extended battery life.
COMPATIBLE BATTERIES: The Schumacher SC1280 will charge 6V and 12V standard, AGM, gel, and deep-cycle batteries.
REVERSE HOOK-UP PROTECTION: With advanced reverse hook-up protection, the charger protects against damage if the clamps are not properly connected.

Essential Charging and Maintaining

Keep Batteries in Top Condition

Keep 12V batteries in optimum condition with the Schumacher SC1280 15A 6V/12V Fully Automatic Battery Charger and Maintainer. The SC1280 features auto voltage detection, multi-stage charging, float mode monitoring, bad battery detection, and reverse hook-up protection.

Advanced Battery Charging Technology

FLOAT MODE MONITORING

While in float mode, a battery maintainer delivers a small current when necessary to keep the unit fully charged.

MULTI-STAGE CHARGING

Keep your batteries in top condition with Schumacher’s advanced charging algorithm for optimum battery health.

BUILT-IN SAFETY

The SC1280 prevents battery damage with reverse hook-up protection, which stops the charger from operating if the clamps are reversed.

MULTI-FUNCTION DISPLAY

Use the display to check battery voltage, charging status, and percent of charge. The LEDs denote charging and maintain status and clamps reversed.

YOU CAN RELY ON SCHUMACHER

KEEP IT ROLLING WITH SCHUMACHER’S LINE OF BATTERY CHARGERS/MAINTAINERS

Professional mechanics and automotive enthusiasts trust Schumacher Electric to provide high-quality and innovative automotive products. Since 1947, Schumacher has been designing and producing industry-leading power conversion technology. Schumacher’s current range of products includes EV chargers, traditional battery chargers, maintainers, jump starters, portable power stations, diagnostic tools, battery accessories, LED work lights, lithium-powered products, and more.


Previous page

  1. HOME GARAGE

    Every home garage should have a quality Schumacher battery charger/maintainer.

  2. POWER SPORT RIDERS

    The SC1280 ensures that your motorcycle, ATV, and other power sports batteries are ready to play.

  3. CAR RESTORERS

    The unit’s maintain mode can keep your battery in top condition during restoration.

  4. BOATERS

    The unit can be used to maintain marine batteries, although they should be maintained on shore.

Next page

From the brand

Premium Glow Products

Our story

How we got our start GlowCity started back in 2009 simply selling glow products at local fireworks events. We quickly discovered and created amazing glow products and started selling online. Selling our products on Amazon took our business to the next level and we continue to expand our product line! What makes our product unique We focus on only selling Premium glow products. We only want to sell products that truly amaze customers with every purchase! We want to provide our customers with the best of the best LED products in the world! Most of our products use LED lights for the most magnificent glow! Why we love what we do Selling glow products is fun! Who doesn’t like glow products!? People have always been fascinated with things that light up and glow! We have had a great time exploring the world of glow products and finding new ways to enjoy light up products!

Bright – Our light up football features not 1, but 2 LED lights for up to 30 hours of evening play on the field, at the beach, and even during camping.
Impact Activated – Ready, set, glow! This LED football illuminates from the inside with a tap and automatically shuts off when not in use.
Durable – These light up balls sport a sturdy, water-resistant exterior and use grommets to help keep the LED lights secured in their compartments.
Setup – Each glow football comes with instructions and batteries. Simply inflate using a pump to start passing, punting, and scoring away.
Football Gifts – If you’re fumbling to find the perfect present for the football fan in your life, our LED football is just the surprise your gift receiver will appreciate.

Wonder what it’s like to play football at night? Our regulation-sized, glow-in-the-dark football has 2 LED lights that turn on as soon as you tap the ball. When you’re done playing, the LEDs power off after 40 seconds of inactivity.

Read more

New Arrivals

Pink Tool Set

Drills & Pliers

Longer Lasting Power: the pink drill set is powered by a powerful 12-Volt, 1.5 AH Lithium-ion battery for enough power for a full range of applications.
Compact and Lightweight Design: the pink drill driver allows users to carry out drilling/driving tasks in confined spaces and offers users greater comfort and efficiency on the job site.
Multiple Purposes: the pink power drill features a 3/8 in. keyless chuck with a 19-position clutch adjusts torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. The drill is designed with variable 2-speed settings (0-400 rpm and 0-1500 rpm) for multiple purposes.
Notice：This is a carbon brushes drill. It is normal that the brushes produce sparks from the electromagnetic charge which are clearly visible inside the drill.
The pink drill set for women is perfect for your home use or gifts.

12V Cordless Drill Set includes:

(1) 12V Cordless Drill Driver;

FASTPRO 12V Lithium-ion Cordless Pink Drill Driver Set powered by a powerful 12-Volt, 1.5 AH Lithium-ion battery for enough power for a full range of applications. The power drill features a 3/8 in. keyless chuck with a 19-position clutch adjusts torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. The drill is designed with variable 2-speed settings (0-400 rpm and 0-1500 rpm) for multiple purposes. The compact and lightweight design allows users to carry out drilling/driving tasks in confined spaces and offers users greater comfort and efficiency on the job site. Its built-in LED light to illuminate work surfaces and allows users to quickly change attachments for any project need.

Product Description

[Upgraded Waterproof Performance] More outstanding than the same competing products on the market is our waterproof performance, which has been upgraded from non-waterproof to IP67 waterproof, suitable for various outdoor scenarios and weather.At the same time,it can withstand high temperatures (up to 200°C, 400°F) for long-lasting use without easily deforming.
[Super Bright LED Lights] Our BBQ light with 10 super bright LED bulbs and over 100 lumens that can illuminate for up to 50,000 hours. The brightness can cover most home grill, so there is no need to worry about the situation where the light is not illuminated.
[Ultra High Adaptability] The bbq grill light supports 360-degree & 180-degree rotation, the flexible light head illuminates the entire grill from all angles, The upgraded adjustable C-clamp is fits most grill handle poles,convenient and easy to use.Comes with 3 AAA batteries.

Price: $77.49 - $62.72
(as of Nov 29,2022 00:29:24 UTC – Details)


The CL120VP Electrical Test Kit from Klein Tools is designed with optimum reliability and safety in mind. Kit comes with 1 meter and 3 testers for a variety of applications and all stored within a convenient padded pouch. The CL120 is an AC auto-ranging 400 Amp AC/DC digital clamp meter. The RT210 Receptacle Tester detects common wiring problems for Standard and GFCI AC electrical outlets. The NCVT-3P is a dual range non-contact tester with flashlight for a broad variety of voltage applications from 12 to 1000V AC or 70 to 1000V AC. Test AC and DC voltage at four commonly used ranges with the ET40 Voltage Tester.
CL120 Clamp Meter measure AC current via the clamp, and AC/DC voltage, resistance and continuity via test leads
Meter has backlit LCD for ease of viewing in low light and is CAT III 600V, Class 2 Double Insulated
RT210 detects the most common wiring problems in standard and GFCI receptacles
A convenient chart on RT210 helps determine wiring conditions open ground, reverse polarity, open hot, open neutral, and hot/ground reversed
NCVT-3P has dual-range capabilities to detect from 12 to 1000V AC or 70 to 1000V AC for a broad variety of low-voltage or standard voltage applications
Bright flashlight illuminates work area and may be used independent of NCVT-3P voltage detection function
ET40 tests AC voltages from 12V to 240V AC at four useful levels aligned with commonly used residential voltages

Read more

About Klein Tools

As an American manufacturer of hand tools for more than 160 years, Klein Tools makes premium-quality, professional-grade tools that deliver performance, durability and precision. Our team continues to put six generations of expertise into each tool by using the highest quality materials and superior workmanship.

Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.

Electrical Tester / Auto-Ranging Digital Clamp Meter Kit, GFCI Tester, Line Splitter, Pouch, Leads, 3 x AAA

Klein Tools Clamp Meter Electrical Test Kit includes the CL120 400A Auto-Ranging Digital Clamp Meter, RT210 GFCI Receptacle Tester and 69409 Line Splitter 10x. The Electrical Test Kit allows for easy testing of live circuits and measuring of current and voltage. Included is a carrying pouch, test leads and batteries.

  • Measure AC current via the clamp, and AC/DC voltage, resistance and continuity via test leads
  • Detects the most common wiring problems in standard and GFCI receptacles including open ground, reverse polarity, open hot, open neutral and hot/ground reversed
  • Line splitter allows the measuring of current draw up to 15A without splitting the load’s power cord
  • CAT III 600V, Class 2, Double insulation safety rating
  • AC Auto-Ranging 400 amp digital clamp meter
  • Backlit display for clear readings
  • Includes a case, test leads and batteries

Read more
